history.proof: intros. revert a. induction H. - intros a. rewrite sum_n_m_zero. unfold minus. symmetry. apply AbelianGroup.class. sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros. qauto use: @plus_comm, sum_Sn, Nat.le_succ_l, sum_n_Sm, Nat.lt_succ_r, @plus_assoc unfold: minus.

exceptions.tactic: intros G a m n H.
intros G' a m n H.
intros G' a' m n H.
intros G' a' m' n H.
intros G' a' m' n' H.

exceptions.exn: The reference monoid_law2 was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros G a m n H. revert a. induction H. - intros a. simpl. rewrite sum_n_m_zero. unfold minus. symmetry. apply monoid_law2. - intros a Hrec. unfold sum_n_m.
